com.tim.yamba

Class StatusData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tim.yamba.StatusData

  • public class StatusData
extends java.lang.Object
    Container of the operations of database.
    It encapsulates the details of android.database.sqlite. Use YambaApplication.getStatusData() to get the single instance of this application.
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
    YambaApplication

      • insertOrIgnore

        public void insertOrIgnore(ContentValues values)
        Use dbHelper to insert values. If the values cannot be inserted to the database because the key value conflicts. That is, any android.database.SQLException will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        values - is data to be inserted to database
        See Also:
        android.database.SQLException
